message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you that I believe will be of great value to your business. I'm offering you a product that I'm sure you'll find incredibly valuable, and I'm confident it will bring a significant return on your investment.  I'm willing to part with it for $1,200,000. This represents a substantial savings for you, given its worth to your business.  Let's discuss this further and I'm sure we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement.
